title: A Treatise on Faith and the Creed.
author: Augustine

paragraphs.text: A Treatise on Faith and the Creed.
[De Fide Et Symbolo.] in One Book.
[De Fide Et Symbolo.] in One Book.
Translated by Rev. S. D. F. Salmond, D.D., Professor of Systematic Theology, Free Chruch College, Aberdeen.
[A discourse delivered before a council of the whole North African Episcopate assembled at Hippo-Regius.]
